thread.title: BRIEF-Medical Transcription Billing Says On May 4, Executed Apa To Buy Assets Of Orion Healthcorp, 13 Of Its Affiliates

title: BRIEF-Medical Transcription Billing Says On May 4, Executed Apa To Buy Assets Of Orion Healthcorp, 13 Of Its Affiliates
text:
Market News May 7, 2018 / 10:29 AM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Medical Transcription Billing Says On May 4, Executed Apa To Buy Assets Of Orion Healthcorp, 13 Of Its Affiliates Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 7 (Reuters) - Medical Transcription Billing Corp :
* MEDICAL TRANSCRIPTION BILLING SAYS ON MAY 4, EXECUTED APA TO BUY ASSETS OF ORION HEALTHCORP, 13 OF ITS AFFILIATES - SEC FILING
* MEDICAL TRANSCRIPTION BILLING - APA TO ACQUIRE SUBSTANTIALLY ALL REVENUE CYCLE, PRACTICE MANAGEMENT, GROUP PURCHASING ORGANIZATION ASSETS OF ORION
* MEDICAL TRANSCRIPTION BILLING SAYS PURCHASE PRICE FOR ORION ASSETS WILL BE PAID IN CASH, ASSUMPTION OF CERTAIN SPECIFIED LIABILITIES - SEC FILING
* MEDICAL TRANSCRIPTION BILLING - PURCHASE PRICE FOR ORIONâ€™S ASSETS EQUAL TO APPROXIMATELY BETWEEN $10-12 MILLION
* MEDICAL TRANSCRIPTION BILLING - IF APA TERMINATED ORION MUST PAY BREAK-UP FEE TO MTBC EQUAL TO $400,000, REIMBURSE MTBC'S EXPENSES OF UP TO $200,000 Source text: [ bit.ly/2jAq30X ] Further company coverage:
